Why CPD Trainings

icon1

Benefit 1 - Tailored training solutions for all EVA Members

A wide selection of online modules is available that you can combine in an 'à la carte' training and development path

calendar_icon

Benefit 2 - An online Calendar for all EVA-CPD training events

A wide selection of online modules is available that you can combine in an 'à la carte' training and development path

other_icon

Benefit 3 - Curated to address the contemporart professional needs

Carefully prepared curriculums and modules based on current professional gap and market interests

Top Courses

Public Private partnership

This e-course is aimed for all actors from the public and private sector involved in animal health, animal welfare and veterinary public health for effective communication and collaboraation at country level.

OIE Standards

You want to know everything about WOAH international standards: how they are prepared and adopted? how to best use them? how to easly find them? then this e-course is for you.

Quality of Veterinary Service

This E-course describes in depth the fundamental principles of the quality of veterinary services and introduces the WOAH PVS evaluation tool to understand veterinary services can be evaluated through 45 criteria.
